stories.description: User don't have to pay withdrawal fee when no treasury address is set even if withdrawal fee is set
User have to pay withdrawal fee and it will be given to 1 treasury account when they do userWithdrawRebalance
User have to pay the latest withdrawal fee set post deletion of the existing of the withdrawal fee and it will be transferred to 1 treasury account when they do userWithdrawRebalance
1st set withdrawal fee and Users pay it, 2nd reset the withdrawal fee to 0 and User should not pay the withdrawal fee
User have to pay withdrawal fee and it will be splitted among 2 treasury accounts when they do userWithdrawRebalance
User have to pay withdrawal fee and it will be transferred to 1 treasury account among 2 accounts if another have 0% share when user do userWithdrawRebalance
User have to pay the latest withdrawal fee set post deletion of the existing withdrawal fee when they do userWithdrawRebalance
User have to pay the old withdrawal fee if treasury fee is also set and then later governance trying to set wrong treasury fee share when user do userWithdrawRebalance
FinanceOperator should be able to set withdrawal fee
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set withdrawal fee out of basis range (0-10000)
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set withdrawal fee for vault contract with 0x0 address
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set withdrawal fee for vault contract with EOA address
Non-FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set withdrawal fee

setActions.message: caller is not the finance operator

FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set empty treasury accounts array
FinanceOperator should be able to set 1 treasury account

Non-FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set 2 treasury accounts

stories.description: FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set treasury with address(0)
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set any 1 treasury address among multiple treasury addresses with address(0)
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set treasury account fee shares not equal to withdrawal fee share
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set treasury share for vault contract with 0x0 address
FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set treasury share for vault contract with EOA address
Old-FinanceOperator shouldn't be able to set the withdrawal fee
